channel.title: How do i make admins able to spawn
channel.description: How do i make admins able to spawn... because i noteiced that on my sever admins cant trade or drop items... and they cant spawn so then they are blocked from getting new items. So i need help on make admins able to spawn in make 317 server

item.title: How do i make admins able to spawn
item.dc:creator: @noobyest_noob noobyest noob
item.description:

ok i have made it so admins can spawn now ty hotdog

item.title: How do i make admins able to spawn
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Delta?

	    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) { //Greater then 2 Means Owner or better
		        String[] args = command.split(" ");
	         if(args.length == 3) {
			int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
				addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
			} else {
				sM("No such item.");
			}
		} else {
			sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
		}
	    }

If i dont want my admins to spawn i just make it so im the only one who can spawn.

item.title: How do i make admins able to spawn
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

To make admins spawn go into client.java search spawn code and change player rights to 2. To make them be able to trade Search
if(other.playerRights == 2){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;
}
And delete the
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;
